args_list: 命令你的英雄攻击目标单位或者区域，移动过程中会攻击路上的所有敌人，如果是某个单位，则会一直攻击这个单位直到自己或对方死亡。
无论你的单位做什么，会立即停止该单位的运动，但随后会攻击周围的地方单位。
这是你的英雄，双击或者按键F1可以快速定位到你的英雄位置，单击则可以显示英雄信息
每点力量增加25点生命值
每点力量提高0.05生命回复
每点敏捷增加0.02的攻击速度
每点智力增加10点魔法值
每点魔法提高0.03魔法回复
通过杀死敌方苏打获得
蓝色汽水获得升级，目前等级为：
红色汽水获得升级，目前等级为：
补丁1 有空加进框架
Control your hero to attack the target unit or area, who will attack all the enemies in its path. If the target is a unit, the attack won't stop until your hero or the target dies
Your unit will stop its actions immediately and then attack nearby units
Your hero is good to go. Double click or press F1 to locate it. Single click to see its details
For each Strength Point, HP can increase by 25
For each Strength Point, HP regen speed can increase by 0.05
For each Agility Point, attack speed can increase by 0.02
For each Agility Point, armor value can increase by 0.1
For each Intelligence Point, attack speed can increase by 10
For each Intelligence Point, mana regen speed can increase by 0.03
Gold coins gained by killing enemies can be used to purchase various items
Each point of main attribute can increase 1 attack power
